text: The Lamborghini Miura is a sports car that was built by Lamborghini from 1966 to 1972.History of the 1966-1972 Lamborghini Miura. www.hagerty.com. Retrieved December 26, 2021 The Miura is named after the fighting bull. It was designed by Marcello Gandini. 764 automobiles were produced. == References == ==Other websites== *Lamborghini's Official website * Miura Category:Coupes Category:Sports cars Category:1960s automobiles Category:1970s automobiles
title: Lamborghini Miura
